A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Star Wars has always been better in concept than in execution. Books & Video Games do a better job exploring the lore than 5/8 saga movies. I feel like The Last Jedi is the first Star Wars movie since Empire Strikes Back that gives a refreshing story that raises moral questions and delves deep into the human aspects of this alien universe. I loved it very much and do not understand all the hate. I was so thankful that the plot did not revolve around the deathstar. I think years from now this movie will be looked on as a classic.
